###### Tours FAQ
If one of your stops includes West Hills' tasting room, the tasting fee is covered. For other vineyards, tasting fees are not included and typically range from $20 to $40 per person, often waivable with a minimum purchase. Weâ€™ll discuss your tasting fee budget during our initial call to ensure everything aligns with your preferences. #### Are the tasting fees for each winery included?
